templates.name: Help Requested Email
templates.body:
TO:'dbwesterhaus@ku.edu'
CC:''
BCC:''
SUBJECT:'Help Requested on {@date: Date}'

BODY:
Hello David,

Wanted to follow up on project {@text: Project ID} that needs an install on {@date: Date}. 
Here is my email {@email: Email}

Best regards,
{@text: Name| Enter Name}
